H0.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Yanjing

H1.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Dadu

H2.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Beiping

H3.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Peking

A4.text: The Mongolian Yuan dynasty originally restored the name Yanjing before constructing a new capital adjacent to the former settlement.

A5.text: Beiping (then romanized as Peiping), in both its connotations, was restored as the name in 1928 by the Republic of China following its reconquest of Peking from the warlords during the Northern Expedition.

A6.text: When Kublai Khan made Dadu the capital of the Mongol-led Yuan dynasty (1279â€“1368), all of China was ruled from Beijing for the first time.
